data.name: Agreement1
data.value: User agreement

data.name: Agreement10
data.value: 1.7. The Present Agreement is a public offer. At the time the User is issued the access to the materials of online-service «TERMINAL YST», he is considered to accept the conditions of the Agreement.

data.name: Agreement11
data.value: 1.8. All possible disputes raised from the Agreement or connected with it are subject to consideration, including dispute related to any change, performance, violation, termination, declaring agreement void or unconcluded, and to be sent for settlement to the Arbitrary court of independent non-for-profit organization «Center of Arbitrary court proceedings and mediation» (№ 1147600000866, administration office: 150014, Yaroslavskaya oblast, Saltykova Shedrina street, h. 21, office 420) in accordance with the Regulation about Arbitrary Court of independent non-for-profit organization «center of Arbitrary court proceedings and mediation» (hereinafter – Regulation) and the Rules of arbitration in the independent non-for-profit organization «center of Arbitrary court proceedings and mediation» (hereinafter - Rules). The Parties agree, that Regulation and Rules are an integral part of the Arbitration Agreement. The Parties are acknowledged and agreed with Regulation and Rules. The decision of the Arbitrary court of independent non-for-profit organization «Center of Arbitrary court proceedings and mediation» on any case is final and not subject to any appeal.

data.name: Agreement12
data.value: 1.9. Nothing in the Agreement can be interpreted as establishment of any agency relations, companionship, cooperation, employment, or any other relations between the User and JSC TC “Yarshintorg”, not stipulated directly in the Agreement.

data.name: Agreement13
data.value: 1.10. In case the Court declares any provision of the Agreement as void or not subject to obligatory implementation, the other provisions of the Agreement stay in effect.

data.name: Agreement14
data.value: 1.11. If JSC TC “Yarshintorg” fails to act immediately in case any User violates the Agreement provisions, JSC TC “Yarshintorg” still has the right to take later corresponding measures to protect its interests and rights in accordance with legislation.

data.name: Agreement15
data.value: 1.12. The User is allowed to use online service «TERMINAL YST» only after he passes registration and authorization in accordance with the established procedure.

data.name: Agreement16
data.value: 1.13. Technical, organizational and commercial conditions for the usage of online service «TERMINAL YST», as well as its functional possibilities are stipulated in the present Agreement, and also individual publishing on the Webpage.

data.name: Agreement17
data.value: 2. Information on the product

data.name: Agreement18
data.value: 2.1. Each photo-sample is followed by text information: price and description of the product. The quality of adjustment and screen parameters of the User’s computer can distort the color of the product. The User has the right to use feedback form to clarify the characteristics of the required product.

data.name: Agreement19
data.value: 2.2. The price, indicated in online service «TERMINAL YST» can be changed by JSC TC “Yarshintorg” unilaterally. The price for the paid goods is not subject to any changes.

data.name: Agreement2
data.value: for online service «TERMINAL YST»

data.name: Agreement20
data.value: 3. Rights, responsibilities and obligations of the User.

data.name: Agreement21
data.value: 3.1. The User is obliged to recognize legal effect of the information on the online service «TERMINAL YST» within the whole term of Agreement, including product price, product range, terms of delivery, etc., and recognize the legal effect of all the actions taken from his/her name under hers/his unique login and password on the online service «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement22
data.value: 3.2. The User is forbidden to transfer to the 3d parties any data published on «TERMINAL YST» including, but not restricted to: product range, pricing, delivery terms, other information.

data.name: Agreement23
data.value: 3.3. The User agrees not to take any actions, that can be considered as violation of the Russian law or international rights norms, including violation of intellectual property rights, author’s rights and related rights, as well as any other actions that lead or can lead to malfunctioning of the Website and online service.

data.name: Agreement24
data.value: 3.4. The chosen Login and Password are required and sufficient information for service sign-in. The User has no right to transfer his Login and Password to 3d parties, he takes full responsibility for these data safety and the way of their protection.

data.name: Agreement25
data.value: 3.5. The User can create orders, reserve the goods on online service «TERMINAL YST», receive the order confirmation, and edit the order, follow-up the status and flow.

data.name: Agreement26
data.value: The User can individually set the sale price:

data.name: Agreement27
data.value: In relation to basic price

data.name: Agreement28
data.value: In relation to purchase price

data.name: Agreement29
data.value: In relation to recommended price

data.name: Agreement3
data.value: 1. General provision.

data.name: Agreement30
data.value: 3.6. The User can determine the delivery address; leave the comments to the order.

data.name: Agreement31
data.value: 3.7. The user can not use information of online service «TERMINAL YST» without permission of JSC TC “Yarshintorg”.

data.name: Agreement32
data.value: 3.8. Comments or any other notes left by the User on online service «TERMINAL YST» shouldn’t contradict to the RF legislation and general norms of ethics.

data.name: Agreement33
data.value: 3.9. The User is aware that JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take any responsibility for visiting or usage of any links to external recourses that can be found in the content of «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement34
data.value: 3.10. The User accepts the clause that all the materials of online service «TERMINAL YST» or any part of them can be accompanied with the advertisement. The User agrees JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take any responsibility nor has no obligations connected with this advertisement.

data.name: Agreement35
data.value: 3.11. The User confirms that he is acknowledged with all Clauses of the present Agreement and accepts them unconditionally.

data.name: Agreement36
data.value: 4. Rights, obligations and liabilities of JSC TC “Yarshintorg”

data.name: Agreement37
data.value: 4.1. In case the User violates the present Agreement, as well as the corresponding Delivery Agreement, JSC TC “Yarshintorg” has right to temporarily stop or completely deny the access of the User to online service «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement38
data.value: 4.2. JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take responsibility for the following parameters of car batteries, established by the producer: crank current, external design.

data.name: Agreement39
data.value: 4.3. JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take responsibility for incorrectly selected goods, as the information on the product search is referential.

data.name: Agreement4
data.value: 1.1. The present agreement is concluded between the User and JSC TC “Yarshintorg” for the usage of online system «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement40
data.value: 4.4. All the conditions/requirements to the order, indicated by the User (chosen products, date and delivery address) JSC TC “Yarshintorg” accepts as required action to be taken. In case of incorrect order data, the responsibility stays with the User.

data.name: Agreement41
data.value: 4.5. JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take responsibility for the pricing established by the User for further sale on online service «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement42
data.value: 4.6. In case the goods are not available the stock, JSC TC “Yarshintorg” is obliged to notify the User (via phone or e-mail).

data.name: Agreement43
data.value: 4.7. Orders received before 13-00 from the Users of online service «TERMINAL YST» in the following regions: Moscow, Moscow region, Saint-Petersburg, Leningradskiy region, Ivanovo and Ivanovsky region, Vladimir and Vladimirskiy region, Kostroma and Kostromskaya region, Vologda, will be prepared for shipment on the same day. Orders from the same regions received after 13-00 will be shipped on the following day after orders time closure.

data.name: Agreement44
data.value: 4.8. Orders received from the Users of online service «TERMINAL YST» from Rostovskiy region, Stavropol and Krasnodar regions, JSC TC “Yarshintorg” is obliged to ship 3 times a week. Orders from Users of online service «TERMINAL YST» in Yekaterinburg, are to be shipped once a week. The delivery to other regions is to be agreed separately.

data.name: Agreement45
data.value: 4.9. JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take responsibility for any damage to the User, caused as a result of improper usage of the goods, ordered via online service «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement46
data.value: 4.10. JSC TC “Yarshintorg” doesn’t take any responsibility or indirect obligations for any potential or occured losses and damages, related to any content of online service «TERMINAL YST», registration of author’s right or information about this registration; good and services available or received via external websites, resources, or any other user’s relation that he started using the information of the Webpage or links to external resources.

data.name: Agreement47
data.value: I accept the agreement.

data.name: Agreement5
data.value: 1.2. Online service «TERMINAL YST» is the ownership of JSC TC “Yarshintorg” and it is located at the address: http://terminal.yst.ru (hereinafter – Website of online service «TERMINAL YST»).

data.name: Agreement6
data.value: 1.3. The User is to be any legal person, private person, self-employed entrepreneur, able to receive and pay for the ordered goods in the order and on the conditions, stipulated in the Present Agreement and established by the RF legislation.

data.name: Agreement7
data.value: 1.4. JSC TC “Yarshintorg” has the right to change the conditions of the Present Agreement unilaterally. These changes come into force at the moment the new Agreement is published on the web page. In case the User doesn’t agree with the introduced changes he has to reject the access and terminate using the «TERMINAL YST».

data.name: Agreement8
data.value: 1.5. The Present Agreement should be regarded in the form and wording as it is published on online service «TERMINAL YST», and should be used and interpreted in accordance with RF legislation.

data.name: Agreement9
data.value: 1.6. The use of materials and services of online service «TERMINAL YST» is subject to the norms of the active legislation of the Russian Federation.
